mapper.insert: insert into planocycle.work_priority_order_mst (company_cd, author_cd, priority_order_cd, product_power_cd, shelf_pattern_cd , common_parts_data, partition_flag, partition_val) values (#{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productPowerCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shelfPatternCd,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commonPartsData}::json, #{partitionFlag,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{partitionVal,jdbcType=SMALLINT}) on conflict(company_cd,priority_order_cd) do update set shelf_pattern_cd = #{shelfPatternCd,jdbcType=BIGINT} ,common_parts_data = #{commonPartsData}::json

insert into planocycle.work_priority_order_mst
company_cd,
author_cd,
priority_order_cd,
product_power_cd,
shelf_pattern_cd,
attribute1,
attribute2,
partition_flag,
partition_val,

insert into planocycle.work_priority_order_mst(priority_order_cd,company_cd,author_cd,product_power_cd,shelf_pattern_cd ,partition_flag,partition_val,common_parts_data,top_partition_val,top_partition_flag) select priority_order_cd,company_cd,#{authorCd},product_power_cd,shelf_pattern_cd ,partition_flag,partition_val,common_parts_data,top_partition_val,top_partition_flag from planocycle.priority_order_mst where company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select product_power_cd as productPowerCd,shelf_pattern_cd as shelfPatternCd,common_parts_data as commonPartsData ,partition_flag as partitionFlag,partition_val as partitionVal,top_partition_val,top_partition_flag from planocycle.work_priority_order_mst where priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd} and company_cd = #{companyCd} and author_cd = #{authorCd}
select product_power_cd from planocycle.work_priority_order_mst where company_cd =#{companyCd} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd}
